Title: User Login - Valid Credentials
Description: Test that user can login with valid credentials
Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login button
Expected Result: User should be logged in and redirected to dashboard

Title: User Login - Invalid Password
Description: Test login failure with invalid password
Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid username  
3. Enter invalid password
4. Click Login button
Expected Result: Error message should be displayed and user remains on login page

Title: Homepage Load Test
Steps:
1. Open browser
2. Navigate to homepage URL
3. Wait for page to load
Expected Result: Homepage should load within 3 seconds with all elements visible

Title: Search Functionality
Description: Test search bar returns correct results
Steps:
1. Navigate to search page
2. Enter search query
3. Click Search button
Expected Result: Relevant results should be displayed matching the search query

Title: Button Hover Effect
Description: Verify button changes color on hover
Steps:
1. Navigate to any page with buttons
2. Hover mouse over button
Expected Result: Button background color should change to indicate hover state

Title: API Response Time
Description: Test API responds within acceptable time
Steps:
1. Send GET request to /api/users endpoint
2. Measure response time
Expected Result: API should respond within 200ms with status code 200
